#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select s.* from sb_stowage as s LEFT JOIN sb_stowage_bill_goods_label as l ON s.id = l.stowage_bill_id LEFT JOIN sb_waybill as w ON w.id =l.waybill_id where w.id = #{waybillId}
GROUP BY s.id
